targets.query: SELECT max("value") FROM "mi" WHERE ("entity_id" = 'r1t_odometer') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "mi" WHERE ("entity_id"::tag = 'r1t_odometer') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.description:
Divides current odometer reading by the number of days since June 27th, 2024 (epoch 1719446400000)

Color thresholds:

	•	Green (On Track): <= 27.4
	•	Yellow (Caution): 27.5 - 30.0
	•	Red (Over Limit): > 30.0
panels.title: Average Miles Per Day Since Delivery

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "autogen"."%" WHERE ("entity_id"::tag = 'r1t_estimated_vehicle_range') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT max("value") FROM "autogen"."ft" WHERE ("entity_id"::tag = 'r1t_altitude') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT last("value") FROM "mph" WHERE ("entity_id"::tag = 'r1t_charging_rate') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "autogen"."%" WHERE ("entity_id"::tag = 'r1t_battery_state_of_charge') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)

panels.description: Tracks efficiency (miles per kWh) of drives. 0 or null values mean the vehicle didn't move in that time period where efficiency was calculated.

targets.query: SELECT top("value", 1) FROM "mi/kWh" WHERE ("entity_id"::tag = 'rivian_efficiency') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)

panels.title: Efficiency History

targets.query:
SELECT last("value"), first("value")
FROM "mi"
WHERE ("entity_id" = 'r1t_odometer') AND $timeFilter
